---
title: "News"
description-meta: "One-line updates"
title-block-banner: false
---

<div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-3">
  <h2 class="m-0">All updates</h2>
  <a href="files/data/news.json" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary" target="_blank">View data (JSON)</a>
</div>

<div id="news-archive" class="list-group"></div>

<script>
  (function () {
    const NEWS_PATH = "files/data/news.json"; // relative to site root

    function renderLinks(links) {
      if (!Array.isArray(links) || links.length === 0) return "";
      return ' · ' + links.map(l => {
        const href = l.href || l.url || "#";
        const text = l.text || "link";
        return `<a href="${href}" target="_blank" rel="noopener">${text}</a>`;
      }).join(' · ');
    }

    fetch(NEWS_PATH, {cache: "no-cache"})
      .then(r => r.json())
      .then(items => {
        const container = document.getElementById("news-archive");
        if (!Array.isArray(items) || !container) return;

        items.forEach(i => {
          const div = document.createElement("div");
          div.className = "list-group-item";
          const id = i.date ? i.date : "";
          if (id) div.id = id; // deep link target

          let links = renderLinks(i.links);
          if (!links && i.url) {
            links = ' · ' + `<a href="${i.url}" target="_blank" rel="noopener">details</a>`;
          }

          div.innerHTML = `<strong>${i.date || ""}</strong> — ${i.text || ""}${links}`;
          container.appendChild(div);
        });

        if (container.children.length === 0) {
          const li = document.createElement("div");
          li.className = "list-group-item";
          li.textContent = "No updates yet.";
          container.appendChild(li);
        }
      })
      .catch(err => {
        console.error("News load error:", err);
        const container = document.getElementById("news-archive");
        if (container) {
          const li = document.createElement("div");
          li.className = "list-group-item";
          li.textContent = "News temporarily unavailable.";
          container.appendChild(li);
        }
      });
  })();
</script>

<!-- Maintenance tip
- Add new entries to files/data/news.json at the TOP of the array.
- Fields: date (YYYY-MM-DD), text, url (optional), links (optional array of {text, href}).
-->
